refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns URL used to access particular HTTP resource.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function is used to get in VSP/VSPX context the URL used to access current resource (page). It check whether 'Host' header field is specified, if not will return as a host information the IP address resolved via connected socket information.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para:
The return type of soap_current_url()
is an string containing the URL of the HTTP request.
